title: 88/18/EEC: Commission Decision of 22 December 1987 amending Decision 87/119/EEC as regards the list of establishments in Brazil approved for the purpose of importing meat products into the Community
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 22 December 1987
amending Decision 87/119/EEC as regards the list of establishments in Brazil approved for the purpose of importing meat products into the Community
(88/18/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 87/119/EEC is hereby replaced by the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 December 1987.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 26, 31. 1. 1977, p. 85.
(2) OJ No L 362, 31. 12. 1985, p. 8.
(3) OJ No L 49, 18. 2. 1987, p. 37.
(4) OJ No L 238, 21. 8. 1987, p. 39.
